name: Matcha Brewing Workshop
description:
Join us for a refreshing afternoon of matcha mastery at Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters.
In collaboration with Got Tea, this immersive Matcha Brewing Workshop will guide you through the art of brewing ceremonial-grade matcha, exploring matcha styles, pairings, and techniques. Whether you're new to matcha or a long-time fan, this hands-on session is designed to deepen your love for this vibrant green tea. 
What’s Included: 

Expert-led session covering traditional brewing methods (Usucha & Koicha)

Guided tastings of matcha grades and regional variations 

Learn to craft three creative modern matcha beverages
Printed Matcha Booklet to take home
Limited group size for a more focused experience

Date: 31st August 2025 (Sunday)Time: 11 AM - 1 PM Location: Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters, Maker Maxity

Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters, Koramangala 5th block
Don’t miss this unique celebration of matcha, tea culture, and craftsmanship.
Please Note: Tickets for this event are non-refundable and cannot be transferred to future events.
